name: 5 Rights Make A Right
description:
Hello dear gamers!

You are probably reading this segment to see if the game is worth your time. Well, we'd like to think so! In any case it is quite short, so it doesn't hurt to give it a spin.

We can't be too specific about the controls lest we ruin the surprise, but if you really need to know what you're getting into, hover here. We had a lot of fun thinking up interesting challenges that would benefit from the theme we chose, and hope you have a ton of fun with this little game as well!

If you liked the game, please leave a comment (and maybe post your highscores too!). We love getting feedback.

Press 'r' to restart the level.

Press 'h' to view your highscore.


Our personal bests:
Level 1: 5.97s
Level 2: 11s
Level 3: 30s
Level 4: 44s
Level 5: 40s
